meanings.definition: The process of leaking out of a vessel into surrounding tissues.
meanings.sent1: The extravasations of blood from the vessel caused swelling in the tissues.
meanings.sent2: Doctors observed extravasations of dye from the blood vessel during the procedure.
meanings.sent3: The colorful extravasations of paint from the tube created a messy masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like extravasations, spilling out uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The extravasations of water from the dam flooded the entire valley.
